attributes.action: make it an offence for any Police Force in England too use the civil laws of libel to stop criminal complaint being made against any police officer by any local tax payer and to make it an offence to finance any legal action by a police officer in any private prosecution against any complainant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Barry Hunt of Weymouth and a Dorset tax payer was obstructed from making a criminal complaint against a Dorset police officer because the Dorset Police Authority financed a libel claim by the police officer which effectively became an abuse of process of law.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
